entry.def: A nightshirt is a long, loose shirt worn in bed.

auth_sentence.content: Gentlemen stripped the groom to his nightshirt.

auth_sentence.content: She would eventually wake and come out to the kitchen in her nightshirt and call out, Hi, Meg.

auth_sentence.content: Welcome, she added, looking down at Danielle's long bare legs under her nightshirt.
